alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:07PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 245 PM MDT... At 205 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kaycee, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rain and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...The rain and hail will create hazardous travel conditions on Interstate 25, especially north of Kaycee to Reno Hill. Locations impacted include... Interstate 25 between mile markers 255 and 280. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. The heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
